\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
P \& {\mathcal {Hom}(Y,A)} \& {(Y \times P)\sqcup_{(X \times P)}(X\times Q)} \& A \\
Q \& {\mathcal {Hom}(X,A) \times _{\mathcal {Hom}(X,B)}\mathcal {Hom}(Y,B)} \& {Y \times Q} \& B
\arrow["a", from=1-1, to=1-2]
\arrow["m"', from=1-1, to=2-1]
\arrow["{\Phi (f,g)}", from=1-2, to=2-2]
\arrow["{(a^\star, (\text{pr}_1 \circ b)^\star)}", from=1-3, to=1-4]
\arrow["{m \wedge f}"', from=1-3, to=2-3]
\arrow["g", from=1-4, to=2-4]
\arrow["s"{description}, dashed, from=2-1, to=1-2]
\arrow["b"', from=2-1, to=2-2]
\arrow["t"{description}, dashed, from=2-3, to=1-4]
\arrow["{(\text{pr}_2 \circ b)^\star}"', from=2-3, to=2-4]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
